English.Text: Your crew don't seem too keen. Perhaps they know they have no chance hand-to-hand with seasoned pirates. As the two ships adjoin, it is the pirates who make the charge. Almost immediately, a pirate swings an axe an lops off a head. Horrified, your steersman hurriedly spins your ship away, with fighters on both sides falling into the resulting gap. Your depleted crew flees at full speed.
